content: उचित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Fit, proper, right, suitable; उचितस्तदुपालंभः <ls>U. 3</ls>; usually with <ab>inf.</ab>; उचितं न ते मंगलकाले रोदितुं <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Usual, customary; उचितेषु करणीयेषु <ls>Ś. 4</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">7. 12</ls>; <ls>K. 64</ls>; <ls>M. 3. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Accustomed or used to, in <ab>comp.</ab>; नीवारभागधेयोचितैः <ls>R. 1. 50</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 25</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 54</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">60</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 9</ls>; चंदनोचितः <ls>Ki. 1. 34.</ls> {@--4@} Praiseworthy. {@--5@} Delightful, agreeable, pleasurable. {@--6@} Known, understood. {@--7@} Entrusted, deposited. {@--8@} Measured, accurate, adjusted (भित). {@--9@} Acceptable (ग्राह्य).
